trends: There have been no other sightings in Worth
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe had just finished shooting fireworks at a family gathering in worth missouri. we were sitting around talking when i noticed the event. it was a bright red dot moving slowly from north to south. my wife remembered that we had the camera in our car. so we got out the camera and were able to shoot a little video of it before we lost it i would say due to trees, there are several large trees in our little town. there were several witnesses to this event that night, i decided to report this after seeing the same sort of object shot from different locations around the country on july 4th 2009. i only wish i were able to get to the camera faster so there would have been more to show
